~~~~~~~~~~


.. function:: to_address(data: Union[ethereum.base_types.Uint, ethereum.base_types.U256]) -> ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address

compute_contract_address
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


.. function:: compute_contract_address(address: ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address, nonce: ethereum.base_types.Uint) -> ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address
   :noindexentry:

   Computes address of the new account that needs to be created.

   :param address: The address of the account that wants to create the new account.

compute_create2_contract_address
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


.. function:: compute_create2_contract_address(address: ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address, salt: ethereum.base_types.Bytes32, call_data: bytearray) -> ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address
   :noindexentry:

   Computes address of the new account that needs to be created, which is
   based on the sender address, salt and the call data as well.

   :param address: The address of the account that wants to create the new account.
   :param salt: Address generation salt.
   :param call_data: The code of the new account which is to be created.

   :returns: **address** -- The computed address of the new account.
   :rtype: `ethereum.arrow_glacier.fork_types.Address`
